description:
Protect the floor of your MSR Tent and extend the life of your tent, this footprint is designed to better protect your tent from wear-and-tear. Compatible with MSR Access 3, Hubba Tour 3, Zoic 3 or Remote 3 tents.

  • Sized to fit the floor of the your MSR Tent and designed so it doesn't channel rain underneath
  • Dimensions: 211 x 175cm
name: MSR Universal 3 Large Footprint
